parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: 0-based index of the piece of text

title: IGtol.GetTriangleAtIndex
description: Gets the triangle at the specified index.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: 0-based index of the piece of text

remarks:
The return value is the following array of doubles:
[
vertexPt1[3], vertexPt2[3], vertexPt3[3], isFilled, lineType
]
where:
vertexPt1[3]
= First XYZ vertex point
vertexPt2[3]
= Second XYZ vertex point
vertexPt3[3]
= Third XYZ vertex point
isFilled
= Boolean returned as a double and is True if the triangle is filled, false if not
lineType
= Line type (see
swLineTypes_e
)
